```{r}
#| label: load-packages-and-data
#| message: false 
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(moments)

training_raw <- read_csv("data-train.csv") #read raw csv



```


```{r}
#| label: calculating-moments-formatting-data

only_raw <- training_raw |>
  mutate(R_moment_0 = 0) |>
  select(R_moment_0, R_moment_1,
         R_moment_2, R_moment_3,
         R_moment_4)

only_raw_t <- as.data.frame(t(only_raw))

training <- as.data.frame(t(raw2central(only_raw_t))) 
training <- training |>
  add_column(training_raw$St,
             training_raw$Re,
             training_raw$Fr,
             .before = 1)
```
